posts.post_content: EBay has been slow for me, so I'm looking for some cards for sale/trade from my fellow board members. Looking for Hall of Famers, rare backs (especially Piedmont 42 and Hindu), rare variations, southern leaguers, error cards, freaks, etc. Please PM me some offers. thank you :)
Got some offers. would like to think about a few more. Thank you. If i said I'm interested, I still am. Best regards.
Thanks for the great offers so far, but still haven't been able to close a deal yet. Please keep the PMs coming.
Still looking. Thanks for the offers so far, wanting to close a deal please. Also looking for some Hindu Southern Leaguers or more expensive HOFers
